    Waspinatro dropped in on the little quarrle brewing. Hell Beast, Gremlin, 
and the clone of Megatron on one side, Kitkat and her boys on the other side. 
He stood in the middle.
    "Wolfy bot....Megatron is dead?!?!?! Oh no! Let Waspinator have his 
body...please?"
